product_name: Mountain Hardwear Arlando Fleece Jacket - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The women's Mountain Hardwear Arlando Jacket is the new definition of an everyday jacket-smooth-faced, wind-resistant stretch fleece offers a great fit for layering or wearing alone. Polyester/spandex stretch fleece provides full freedom of movement. Chin guard and softly-lined collar are soft on skin. Elastic cuffs and drawcord hem help seal out the cold. Mountain Hardwear Arlando Jacket for women features a zippered sleeve pocket and handwarmer pockets. Closeout.
short_description: The women's Mountain Hardwear Arlando Jacket is the new definition of an everyday jacket-smooth-faced, wind-resistant stretch fleece offers a great fit for layering or wearing alone.
